name: Lemon Fish Bake
ingredients: 8 fish fillets, washed well in cold water 1 lemon, thinly sliced
5 t butter or margarine (﴾about)﴿ ½ c cheddar cheese, shredded
1 t butter or margarine ¼ c lemon juice
steps: salt ¼ to ½ c sour cream
Place fillets in a single layer in a shallow buttered baking dish. Salt each fillet lightly, then top with about 2 tsp.
of melted butter. Cover baking dish with foil. Place in 450 degree oven and bake until fish flakes easily with a fork.
off part of liquid and cover with lemon sauce. Serve each fillet topped with a thin slice of lemon, a dollop of
sour cream, and shredded cheese. Makes 8 servings.
Make a paste of cornstarch and butter. Bring water and lemon juice to a boil. Stir in cornstarch paste and cook
until thickened. Use about 2 t sauce on each fillet.
